item.title: Report E-2025040460
item.description:
Report E-2025040460

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-07
  • City: METAIRIE
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SAFETY-KLEEN SYSTEMS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While loading containers of hazardous waste, the container in question slipped from the secondary containment and release some of its contents. The driver quickly placed spill pads to contain the spill. Internal emergency response team was activated to clean up the release. Emergency response team overpacked damaged container for further transportation.
